Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Clinical Mass Spectrometry Microorganism Identification and Differentiation System
Specimen Type(s): Isolated colonies from solid culture media
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Matrix-Assisted Laser Desorption/Ionization-Time of Flight Mass Spectrometry (MALDI-TOF MS)
Methodologies: Preparation of microbial suspensions for AST
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Copan WASP Colibrí automated specimen preparation system for MALDI-TOF identification and AST microbial suspension processing from isolated bacterial colonies
Indications for Use Summary: Automated in vitro diagnostic specimen preparation system used with WASPLab to prepare MALDI-TOF targets and microbial suspensions for bacterial identification and AST using VITEK MS, MALDI Biotyper CA, VITEK 2, or MicroScan WalkAway systems for isolated colonies of gram-negative and gram-positive bacteria from solid culture media in clinical laboratories.
